None.Name: Shadow Bolts
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, tower shoots a shadow bolt that deals 110 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 160 in total.

None.Name: Relocation
None.Description: Building relocates at another spot within a 50m range. After the relocation tower will be more vulnerable taking 200% more damage for 40 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
